injury.name: Injured Arm
injury.description: * While you have a Injured Arm, you cannot be Strong. * You have Penalty on all "Strong" skills. * In your first round of combat, discard 1 card. * After two nights of rest, remove Injured Arm. * Take 2 Corruption Points to instantly heal Injured Arm.
injury.flavor: A painful injury to a vital limb.
